description: A tourist-centric guide to points of interest throughout the country.  Though it focuses on the north-central US, the driving sections contain some practical tips on proper driving techniques.

variants.description: A tourist-centric guide to points of interest throughout the country.  Though it focuses on the north-central US, the driving sections contain some practical tips on proper driving techniques.
A travelogue about a group of teenagers in the late nineties.
A notebook about living off-the-grid, with a wide collection of stories, examples, tips, and advice.

name.str: Traffic: Why We Drive the Way We Do
name.str_pl: copies of Traffic: Why We Drive the Way We Do

variants.description: A big research book that talks about how roads are built, why they're built in such a manner, and what we can do to improve it.

description: Lots of articles about cars and driving techniques.

A nice-looking magazine about the automobile industry, with shiny images and long articles.  Dated 2019.
A monthly report about recent changes in the transport industry.
A shabby magazine about new and old cars, automobile reviews, general motorsports, and DIY.
An absolutely generic monthly magazine about the automotive industry.
Flashy journal about cars, racing, and mechanics.
An automotive magazine, focused on heavily modifying trucks, SUVs, and cars powered by diesel.
A really old issue about classic car maintenance and restoration.
Monthly magazine about hot rodding, drag racing, and muscle cars.
Boring automobile magazine with a big shiny label.
It seems to be a car magazine, but you can only understand the images, as the text is written in another language.

description: A thick textbook for beginning drivers.  It contains chapters on laws, safe vehicle operation, and defensive driving concepts.

name.str_pl: copies of The Rules of the Road

variants.description: A thick textbook for beginning drivers.  It contains chapters on laws, safe vehicle operation, and defensive driving concepts.

name.str: Guide to Passing the Driving Test
name.str_pl: copies of Guide to Passing the Driving Test

variants.description: A thick, heavy book about every thing you may be asked in your driving exam.  The biggest part of the book contains a 'theory test' with detailed answers, and many how-to's related to driving overall.

name.str: The official DVSA guide to driving
name.str_pl: copies of The official DVSA guide to driving

variants.description: This book is packed with comprehensive information about driving, how to do it properly, and take joy in it.  You wonder how this manual made it here, as DVSA is a British organization, and the book contains information about specific British driving rules.

name.str: Automated Driving and Driver Assistance Systems
name.str_pl: copies of Automated Driving and Driver Assistance Systems

variants.description: This book explains the technologies and approaches of advanced driving systems, how they are designed, and why it is hard to get a good result.  It is difficult to understand sometimes, but it shows driving from a perspective an average driver wouldn't think about.

name.str_pl: copies of The Driving Instructor's Handbook

variants.description: Detailed textbook about how to provide driving lessons, what may be discussed, and how to prevent dangerous situations and collisions.

description: A tourist-centric guide to points of interest throughout the country.  This particular copy is apparently the Anonymous Anarchist's Annual: the cover conceals a wealth of ways to help stick it to The Man, along with plenty of advice for avoiding police.

variants.description: A tourist-centric guide to points of interest throughout the country.  This particular copy is apparently the Anonymous Anarchist's Annual: the cover conceals a wealth of ways to help stick it to The Man, along with plenty of advice for avoiding police.

Classic illegal manual about making weapons and explosives.  The first page contains a quote from its author William Powell, that describes it as "a youthful indiscretion or mistake that can haunt someone during their early years or even longer".
variants.//: really? you don't know how to find the anarchist cookbook?

name.str_pl: copies of Science of Revolutionary Warfare

variants.description: A small, shabby book about making explosives, poisons, and weapons with resources you may find in your backyard.

name.str_pl: copies of The Poor Man's James Bond

variants.description: A collection of American paramilitary knowledge throughout history, containing a lot of information about how to make dangerous weapons and explosives in pretty dry language.
